content:
# I have successfully harvested an additional 10 units of stone, bringing my total stone inventory to 20 units, while still having 10 units of iron ore.

# Now that I have enough stone, I can proceed to craft a stone furnace. The recipe for a stone furnace requires:
# - 3 stone

# With 20 stones available, I can easily craft the stone furnace. I will now craft it.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Attempt to craft a stone furnace using the stones in my inventory.
